name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
sodium acetate
and glycerol
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), sodium acetate (CAS Reg. No. 127-09-3), and glycerol (CAS Reg. No. 56-81-5).
